# The package

There is this **cheatsheet** package that allows you to download all the cheatsheets with one single command.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(cheatsheet)
```

Set your working directory and download into the folder

```{r,eval=FALSE}

get_all_cheatsheets(local_path = "~/Desktop/cheatsheets", tidyverse_only = TRUE) # can also set to FALSE

```
